About Us

30 Years of Plumbing Expertise.
at Your Doorstep.

Courage Plumbing was set up in the year 2000 by Chan Peng Yong.

Peng Yong started out in plumbing working for an established plumbing company in 1980, rising from a skilled technician to become an assistant manager.

He then set out to build his own business. He has been in the Singaporean plumbing industry for over 30 years , and has diverse experience in plumbing projects, including projects at the Singapore Zoological Gardens, Ladyhill condominium and the 3M Tuas factory.

Courage Plumbing seeks to provide reliable and trusted plumbing services for its customers. Customer satisfaction is the best measure of performance to us. Before any project, we will discuss with your needs and requirements to ensure that we can deliver high-quality service.

Speak to us today!
